reference.shortdesc: The stepresult element provides information on the expected outcome of a step.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: If a user interface is being documented, the outcome could describe a dialog box opening or the appearance of a progress indicator. Step results are useful to assure a user that they are on track, but should not be used for every step as this quickly becomes tedious.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The stepresult element is specialized from the itemgroup element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: Once you have the water place it in the microwave. Try not to spill any, as water is very wet. Start the Microwave. As an example, push the Start button The Microwave starts running. You should hear it humming. Once the water begins to boil, stop the Microwave.
